formElement.label: Delete jobs older than
formElement.documentation: Indicate the numbers of days after which jobs should be deleted. To specify a custom value, use the "Switch to property view" icon located on the right hand side of the page, then type in the exact number of days desired

formElement.label: Type of jobs to delete
formElement.documentation: define what jobs you want to delete: Aborted, Error, All

formElement.label: Job property
formElement.documentation: Name of a property attached to your jobs. If this property is set, your job won't be deleted.

formElement.label: Maximum number of jobs to delete
formElement.documentation: Indicate the maximum numbers of jobs to delete. Trying to delete too many jobs, especially with local workspaces, will result in an unstable server (NMB-25946) due to the 1000s of dynamic steps created to delete the local workspace logfiles.

formElement.label: Pattern matching
formElement.documentation: a SQL pattern matching to automatically preserve some jobs. The pattern must solve for a LIKE statement.

formElement.label: Delete
formElement.documentation: If this option is not set, only report is done. No real data are deleted

formElement.label: Compute Usage
formElement.documentation: Check off to skip the computation of the number of steps and the file space used for the job. This will speed up the execution.
